name: prospectpro-verified-business-intelligence
description: ProspectPro - Verified Business Intelligence Platform with Zero Fake Data Policy

scripts.deploy:critical: supabase functions deploy business-discovery-optimized && supabase functions deploy enrichment-orchestrator
scripts.deploy:all: supabase functions deploy business-discovery-optimized && supabase functions deploy enrichment-orchestrator && supabase functions deploy campaign-export && supabase functions deploy enrichment-hunter
scripts.frontend:deploy: npm run build && cd dist && vercel --prod
scripts.static:deploy: npm run build && cd dist && vercel --prod
scripts.cost:analyze: echo 'Check GitHub billing dashboard for usage trends'
scripts.build: tsc && vite build && echo '{"version":2,"rewrites":[{"source":"/(.*)","destination":"/index.html"}],"headers":[{"source":"/(.*)","headers":[{"key":"Cache-Control","value":"public, max-age=0, s-maxage=0, must-revalidate"}]},{"source":"/assets/(.*)","headers":[{"key":"Cache-Control","value":"public, max-age=31536000, immutable"}]}]}' > dist/vercel.json
scripts.deploy:gcs: npm run build && gsutil -m rsync -r -d ./dist/ gs://prospectpro-static-frontend/
scripts.deploy:edge-functions: supabase functions deploy business-discovery && supabase functions deploy business-discovery-optimized && supabase functions deploy campaign-export
scripts.db:setup: echo 'Run SQL from /database/supabase-first-schema.sql in Supabase dashboard'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ node_modules/ && echo 'Cleaned build artifacts'
scripts.archive:legacy: mkdir -p archive/legacy-server && mv server.js api/ modules/ docker/ archive/legacy-server/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Legacy files managed separately'
scripts.health: echo 'Use Edge Function endpoints for health checks'
scripts.test: echo 'Test Edge Functions via Supabase dashboard or curl'
scripts.test:verified-contacts: echo 'Test verified contact discovery with zero fake data validation'
scripts.debug:quick: echo 'Common issue: Check anon key sync and verified contact authentication'
scripts.debug:edge-function: echo 'Test Verified Edge Function: curl -X POST https://sriycekxdqnesdsgwiuc.supabase.co/functions/v1/business-discovery-optimized -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ANON_KEY" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"businessType\": \"test\", \"location\": \"test\"}"'
scripts.debug:fake-data: echo 'Verify zero fake data: Check CSV exports for pattern emails (info@, contact@, etc.)'

author: Alex Torelli

architecture.frontend: Static HTML/JS with verified contact display
architecture.backend: Supabase Edge Functions with zero fake data
architecture.contacts: Apollo API + Professional Licensing + Chamber Directories
architecture.dataPolicy: Zero fake data - verified contacts only
